name: I frogot my backpack
description:
A short dungeon crawling adventure made in 1 week for the BTP game jam. Play as a naïve rouge who has forgotten to bring his backpack to the dungeon. Because of this you can only carry one item but you are more agile. Less inventory, more agility.

Also The wall assets were made by 0x72

https://0x72.itch.io/microfantasy
